name: Toddler Program
description: The older toddlers and preschool children also receive constant care and nurturing, while continuing skill development in personal hygiene, toileting, and helping to care for themselves and their environment. They are assisted in exploring and expressing themselves individually and in various learning groups. They have access to a wide range of established learning areas and activities that include: - Stories and reading - Dramatic play - Drawing and painting - Language development and writing -
